name: Count Dracula Is Dead
description:
My first project in Godot. 

Made as part of a group project at university.

Play as the Ghost of Dracula and fight your way through Van Hellsing XIII's holy warriors.

Use the souls of the dead to upgrade your Health, Strength, Speed and Magic Power.

WASD - Move

LEFT CLICK - Attack

Right Click - Shoot

1/2/3/4 - Upgrade relevant skill
